meanings.sent1: She wore the flauntiest dress at the party.
meanings.sent2: The peacock displayed its flauntiest feathers during the mating dance.
meanings.sent3: The cat strutted around the house in its flauntiest manner, showing off its new collar.
meanings.sent4: The garden was filled with the flauntiest flowers, standing out among the rest.
meanings.sent5: The car dealership showcased the flauntiest vehicles in the showroom, attracting many customers.

meanings.sent1: Her artwork was the flauntiest in the gallery, drawing admiration from all visitors.
meanings.sent2: The mansion on the hill was the flauntiest in the entire neighborhood.
meanings.sent3: The peacock felt like the flauntiest bird in the aviary, strutting around with pride.
meanings.sent4: The flauntiest display of fireworks lit up the night sky, mesmerizing the spectators.
meanings.sent5: The flauntiest jewelry sparkled under the lights, catching everyone's attention.
